Posts.EditableText: I've noticed that a little 'war' between 'awesomeman12345' and 'SivD1' is breaking out on the text adventures site. It all started when SivD1 put a 1 star review on one of awesomeman12345's games, including a passage saying that he should stop putting rude comments on other people's games, otherwise the same would happen to him. And, when I go on to the text adventures site, right on the main menu page, is a 1 star rating review from awesomeman12345 saying 'f**k you a**hole. (trying to keep it PG here) SivD1 actually said he'd report if awesomeman12345 did this again, and he did. But I'll do it for him. I've seen the whole story. So moderators, please help, and discuss on your opinion, on what should happen, etc.
